query.statement:
SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,MAX(A.GNO ) GNO ,MAX(A.USD ) USD ,MAX(A.UMR ) UMR ,MAX(A.ADT ) ADT ,MAX(A.GDATE) GDATE ,MAX(A.ARA ) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU ) BSU ,MAX(A.KND ) KND ,MAX(A.HYN ) HYN ,MAX(A.TGB ) TGB ,MAX(A.BMT_B) BMT_B ,MAX(A.ISD ) ISD ,MAX(Z.ZSPEC3) ZSPEC3 ,MAX(A.ABG ) ABG ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = A.PJT AND SUBSTR(POSID_1,7,1) IN ('L') AND TXT04 != 'C') AS CNT_L ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = A.PJT AND SUBSTR(POSID_1,7,1) IN ('S','W') AND TXT04 != 'C') AS CNT_S ,'' AS STO ,SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,6) AS YYYYMM FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.GNO ,A.GDATE ,A.USD ,A.UMR ,A.ADT
,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAA ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHA ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_GHB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_GHA ELSE A.TGB END TGB
,A.KND ,A.HYN , VALUE((SELECT MAX(CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = A.PJT AND CS116_HNO = A.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B'),D.CS101_ISD) BMT_B ,VALUE(D.CS101_ISD,'') ISD ,B.ABG
FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT ,CS126_HNO HNO ,CS126_GNO GNO ,MIN(CS126_USD) USD ,MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT ,MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ ,MAX(CS126_UMR) UMR ,MIN(CS126_ADT) GDATE ,MAX(CS126_KND) KND ,MAX(CS126_HYN) HYN ,MAX(CS126_TGB) TGB ,MAX(CS126_ARA) ARA ,MAX(CS126_BSU) BSU ,MIN(B.CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD > A.CS126_ADT AND B.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD = '1' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C')
AND A.CS126_USD >= '20170101'
AND CASE WHEN substr(CS126_ADT,1,6) >= substr(CS126_UGS,1,6) THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_UGS END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,6)||'01' AND #GDATE#
AND CASE WHEN substr(CS126_ADT,1,6) >= substr(CS126_USD,1,6) THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_USD END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,6)||'01' AND #GDATE#
GROUP BY CS126_PJT,CS126_HNO,CS126_GNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 D ON D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = D.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = D.CS101_HNO AND D.CS101_PST = 'A6'
) A
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Z ON Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND Z.POSID = A.PJT AND Z.POSID_1 = A.PJT||A.HNO
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO
